item.description:
Direct from the Canterbury Shaker Village website:

" Come join us for our 25th anniversary of celebrating the fiber arts. To help us celebrate we’ll have a new feature this year: the Llama Fashion Show! There will also be sheep-herding demonstrations and other fiber-producing animals on display. Take part in a host of hands-on activities for all ages. Watch demonstrations of spinning, weaving, dyeing, knitting and more. Shop the vendor bazaar for a wide array of beautifully crafted items. There will even be a used equipment sale for textile enthusiasts. An Outdoor Grill Lunch will be available.
Admission: $17 for adults, $8 for children ages 6-17, children 5 and under are free, $42 family rate (includes 2 adults and 3 children). Members are FREE!"

Great opportunity to meet some of the animals and local artisans from the area in the serene setting of the Canterbury Shaker Village. 


We'll be looking for volunteers to drive!
item.name: Wool Day at the Canterbury Shaker Village
